latestEvent.title: FIELD TRIP TO NEXAGATE
latestEvent.description: Our club recently had the opportunity to visit Nexagate and explore the real-world applications of cybersecurity. During the visit, we were introduced to the range of services they offer and got an inside look at their Security Operations Center (SOC), where we observed how threats are monitored and managed in real time. This experience provided us with a clearer picture of the industry and inspired us to continue developing our skills in cybersecurity. A big thank you to Nexagate for the warm welcome and valuable insights.

year2025.title: 2025 - PHISHING AWARENESS WEBINAR
year2025.description: On 22nd March 2025, CYSEC Club collaborated with OWASP, 0day Academy and OffSec in conducting an online webinar open to all universities nationwide. The major topic of this webinar is Social Engineering & Phishing in The Age Of AI. This webinar explains how social engineering works, how malicious actors leverage AI technology to craftÂ a payload, and mitigation techniques that may be used to defend against these actors.

year2025.title: 2025 - GMi BREAK THE ENIGMA CTF 2025
year2025.description: On March 18, 2025, the CYSEC Club organizes an internal university online 24-hour capture-the-flag competition focused on cryptography.  Compete against over 40 other people to earn a total prize fund of RM600.  The CYSEC Club challenge creator has prepared 40+ difficulties ranging from symmetrical and asymmetrical encryption to hashing and obfuscation for players to solve.

year2025.title: 2025 - RED & BLUE TEAM WORKSHOP BY MCC 2024 ALUMNIS
year2025.description: The CYSEC Club hosted a unique session with alumni of the Malaysia CyberSecurity Camp 2024 from February 22 to February 23, 2025.  The workshop's topics center on the theory and core of the blue team and the red team.  This workshop's goal is to provide a clear understanding of the duties and responsibilities of both the Red Team and the Blue Team.  Thus, assisting students in choosing their industry career path.
